column5: awesome stuff bro!
HUGE fish.  Wow.

one of my buddies called me up on thursday and said he found a lake up near his cottage that has massive bass and lots of them so we decided to check it out.. heres some pics of some nice smallies that would fight and dog down 30 feet or something it was nuts!!    my buddy with a nice smallie  then i caught this big ass blue pike thats my biggest blue pike i have caught i dont think they get very big i love the huge fins on this guy!!  then i took a sip of my yummy beer and lit a smoke and casted into the water... the line settled and i worked my secret bait close to shore then i felt a tap tap and had a little smallie on about 12 inches. I began to reel in the smallie when my reel starts SCREAMING line and this massive beast launches out of them water i actually kicked my beer over and almost choked on my smoke. after a heavy battle i manage to haul this big ass barrel mouth bass i didnt weigh it but it was huge. we saw even bigger largies out their but couldnt get them to budge with the weather or something anyways it was fun!!
WOW What a short fat piggy. Very nice. TFS
What an amazing pile of fish.  You owe your buddy huge for finding that lake - so care to post the location here on this here public forum?
Wow....looks like an awesome spot.  Quite a pig you got there...  Thanks for the report  Cheers  Craig
okay ill tell you where it is... up north near some trees lol
Tease
Nice fish, all of them. Feel free to PM me the location.
BEAUTY FISH BRO
wow talk about a hot spot!  cheers!
some really nice looking fish, thanks for sharing.
Wow, you lucked into that spot.  Way to go, those are all brutes.  Joey
WOW..... I truly like the fat hog on the last pic  Great job MuddyWater.... Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice-you know I bet that lake wasn't even very big, some huge bass live in these little lakes we commonly pass on the roads!
Wow Some nice ones. What happended to the beer? LOL
WoW impressive  Great looking pike . I sent you a pm.....
WOW! Reminds me of fall fishing on Georgian bay! Some nice pigs you got there! And thats a pretty beat up looking pike!! Thanks for sharing.
"i actually kicked my beer over and almost choked on my smoke."  This was great!!  Nice fish!!!
Great report and pics!!!  That is a Hugh Jass Largie!!!
Great bass!  Congrats man!  Just showed my wife the post and she made the comment "that last one looks like my kinda fish"!  So you've impressed her as well!
Nice Fish!        Remember;  *Beer on the Pier,Water on the Water.
Some nice fish there! That largie is real fat considering its length ... must have choked down a few frogs or something lol!  Thanks for sharing.
Nice Bass, sorry about the beer...
Great report, the fins on that "blue pike" looks like she should be 20lbs!! Awesome largie!  Cheers, 1leg
Huge fish man, congrat's!
Umm. WOW!
